title: BRIEF-IMF Bentham Announces Completion Of A Law Firm Investment Funded In U.S.
text:
BRIEF-IMF Bentham Announces Completion Of A Law Firm Investment Funded In U.S.

Stock Markets 9 minutes ago (Sep 02, 2019 19:00)

© Reuters. BRIEF-IMF Bentham Announces Completion Of A Law Firm Investment Funded In U.S. Sept 2 (Reuters) - IMF Bentham Ltd : * ANNOUNCES PENDING COMPLETION OF A LAW FIRM INVESTMENT FUNDED IN UNITED STATES THROUGH ITS US INVESTMENT VEHICLE, BENTHAM IMF 1 LLC * UPON COMPLETION OF INVESTMENT, IT IS EXPECTED THAT FUND 1 WILL RECEIVE INCOME FROM INVESTMENT PORTFOLIO OF APPROXIMATELY US$4.7 MLN * FUND 1'S INCOME FROM INVESTMENT EXPECTED TO GENERATE A PROFIT AFTER CAPITALISED OVERHEADS OF ABOUT A$2.1 MLN

BRIEF-IMF Bentham Announces Completion Of A Law Firm Investment Funded In U.S.
description: BRIEF-IMF Bentham Announces Completion Of A Law Firm Investment Funded In U.S.
